fraud_backend.fraud_score_engine.fraud_score_engine module¶

class fraud_backend.fraud_score_engine.fraud_score_engine.FraudScoreEngine[source]¶

Bases: object

Fraud Score Engine.

This class is an abstract class that will be subclassed for important ML algorithms.

classify(transaction_instance)[source]¶

Classify a transaction as fraud or not.

Parameters:transaction_instance (Transaction) – the instance to be clasified

Set the test data set.

Parameters:test_data (list of Transaction) – the set of transactions to use for testing.

Set the training data set.

Parameters:training_data (list of Transaction) – the set of transactions to use for training.

Test the model against a test data set.

train()[source]¶

Train a model.

validate(thresshold)[source]¶

Validate the model.

Parameters:thresshold (float) – the thresshold to be set
